content.rendered:
Natural Landscape of North Idaho

 

Nestled in the natural landscape of North Idaho is the latest one of a kind luxury residential development by Aspen Homes. The Reserve at Cedar Creek is a private gated community with 10 lots spread over 20 acres. Each lot is treed, has  breathtaking mountain views, looks down on a 10 acre meadow and Cedar Creek which runs year-round to provide the perfect backdrop to the beauty of the Northwest.

—

Limited Availability

 

This community is filling up fast. If you have always wanted to live in the great escape of the woods and only minutes from Coeur d’Alene and Post Falls, then let Aspen Homes help build your next dream home. Our doors are wide open. Contact Erik Campbell for more information and for a tour of this project at (208) 664-9171.
